events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to return it for a full refund as soon as possible.
The reported case has been categorized under Refund due to customer's request for a return and money back.
Customer support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m Jessica, and I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and photos of the item you received so we can process your return quickly?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached are the photos showing the incorrect product that was delivered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a return shipment and once the item is received, you will get a full refund to your original payment method.
Thank you for your prompt response and helpful instructions. I appreciate the quick resolution offer.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and no further issues remain, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
